mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customertransfer(ctCid, ctUsp, ctUspId, ctOldHospital, ctOldFeedback, ctNewHospital, ctNewFeedback, ctArrive, ctTransaction) VALUES (#{ctcid}, #{ctusp}, #{ctuspid}, #{ctoldhospital}, #{ctoldfeedback}, #{ctnewhospital}, #{ctnewfeedback}, #{ctarrive}, #{cttransaction})
